text: [Music]
I was in uh Pakistan actually when Danny
got uh uh kidnapped and then uh when he
was murdered I was um in New Jersey I
was working for the Star Ledger um of
New York New Jersey um so as a
journalist it had a huge impact on me
particularly because I've been there uh
just recently ly um I had reported in
Afghanistan and in Pakistan and um um
you know it was just uh horrifying and
and deeply disturbing I think it um just
touched something inside all of us
because um that had never happened
before that you were targeted only on
the basis of the fact that you were a
journalist uh and a premedicate pre
sorry a premeditated uh kidnapping and
murder uh of an innocent person just
because they were doing their job um you
know I think after um Danny's murder
just the level of danger uh for
journalists entered a whole another um
level you
know no I didn't reconsider um I mean it
didn't make me reconsider I still knew
that you know the stories had to be told
and I think when you're a war
correspondent there's some uh level of
danger and risk that comes um naturally
with the job uh but the unique thing
after Danny's arrest and also after um
in Iraq was that you were also actively
a Target you know yourself which wasn't
really the case in previous Wars um but
I do think that the journal took
security uh much more seriously and they
were very extremely Mindful and you know
very cautious because of what had
happened
